dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4762 IH: To require the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP code for particular communities.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Demings introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To require the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP code for particular communities.

section.text: Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the United States Postal Service shall designate a single, unique ZIP code for, as nearly as practicable, each of the following communities:
